question: Maya receives 150 emails a day. 36% of those emails don't require any response. He responds to the rest of them. How many emails does Maya respond to in a 7 day work week?
answer:
Maya receives 150*36/100=<<150*36/100=54>>54 emails that don't require a response
So he responds to 150-54=<<150-54=96>>96 emails per day
In a 7 day work week, Maya responds to 96*7=<<96*7=672>> 672 emails
#### 672
